title: Toilet

properties.name: description
properties.value: There are three toilets in Old School RuneScape. While actual toilet models do not exist, these locations are implied to be toilets, specifically outhouses. Every toilet is occupied and interacting with the door or the individual inside will lead to humorous dialogue.

content:
Toilet
ReleasedVaries (Update unknown)
MembersYes
QuestVaries
LocationVaries
ExamineA door.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID12284

There are three toilets in Old School RuneScape. While actual toilet models do not exist, these locations are implied to be toilets, specifically outhouses. Every toilet is occupied and interacting with the door or the individual inside will lead to humorous dialogue.

In the quest The Feud, it's stated that Traitorous Ali left the bar in search of a toilet, however the bartender claims that they've never seen one anywhere in Gielinor.

After the quest Making Friends with My Arm, Yellow Snow mentions that his homeland has few toilets. This leads to the events of his unfortunate name.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Personalities
  • 3 Trivia
  • 4 Gallery

Locations[edit | edit source]

  • South of Watson's house
  • South-east of the Hosidius Vinery
  • The north-west corner of Fossil Island Museum Camp

Personalities[edit | edit source]

  • Hosidius Vinery toilet
    • Man (Hosidius Vinery toilet)
  • Museum Camp toilet
    • An unidentified man. Strangely, though there is not a Non-player character inside the outhouse, attempting to open the door will cause a man inside to yell Occupied!
  • NPC contact
    • One of the individuals that can be contacted through the Random option of the NPC Contact spell is an unidentified man who claims to be on a toilet.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Banisoch implies that she uses the southern entrance to Brimhaven dungeon as a toilet when the player talks to her after paying the one-time entry fee.
  • There is an escape route from a troll prison the player finds themself in during Making Friends with My Arm. This "smelly hole" is implied to be a makeshift troll toilet by Yellow Snow post quest.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • One of the few toilets in Gielinor, located near the Watson's house. Attempting to open the locked door will result in the player remarking I'm sure this door is locked for a reason. I'll leave it be.

  • One of the few toilets in Gielinor, located near the Hosidius Vinery. Attempting to open the door will cause the man inside to yell Occupied!

  • One of the few toilets in Gielinor, located in the Museum Camp. Attempting to open the door will cause the man inside to yell Occupied!

There are three '''toilets''' in ''[[Old School RuneScape]]''. While actual toilet models do not exist, these locations are implied to be toilets, specifically outhouses. Every toilet is occupied and interacting with the door or the individual inside will lead to humorous dialogue.

In the quest [[The Feud]], it's stated that [[Traitorous Ali]] left the bar in search of a toilet, however the bartender claims that they've never seen one anywhere in [[Gielinor]].

After the quest [[Making Friends with My Arm]], [[Yellow Snow]] mentions that his homeland has few toilets. This leads to the events of his unfortunate name.

==Locations==
* South of [[Watson's house]]
* South-east of the [[Hosidius]] [[Vinery]]
* The north-west corner of [[Fossil Island]] [[Museum Camp]]

==Personalities==
* Hosidius Vinery toilet
**[[Man (Hosidius Vinery toilet)]]
* Museum Camp toilet
**An unidentified [[man]]. Strangely, though there is not a [[Non-player character]] inside the outhouse, attempting to open the door will cause a [[man]] inside to yell {{RSFont|Occupied!}}
* [[NPC contact]]
**One of the individuals that can be contacted through the Random option of the [[NPC Contact]] spell is an [[Transcript:NPC Contact#Man|unidentified man who claims to be on a toilet]].

== Trivia ==
* [[Banisoch]] implies that she uses the southern entrance to [[Brimhaven Dungeon|Brimhaven dungeon]] as a toilet when the player talks to her after paying the one-time entry fee.
* There is an escape route from a [[troll]] prison the player finds themself in during [[Making Friends with My Arm]]. This "smelly hole" is implied to be a makeshift troll toilet by [[Yellow Snow]] post quest.

==Gallery==
<gallery>
File:Watson's house toilet.png|One of the few toilets in Gielinor, located near the [[Watson's house]]. Attempting to open the [[locked door]] will result in the player remarking {{RSFont|I'm sure this door is locked for a reason. I'll leave it be.}}
File:Vinery toilet.png|One of the few toilets in Gielinor, located near the [[Hosidius]] [[Vinery]]. Attempting to open the [[door]] will cause the [[Man (Hosidius Vinery toilet)|man]] inside to yell {{RSFont|Occupied!}}
File:Museum Camp toilet.png|One of the few toilets in Gielinor, located in the [[Museum Camp]]. Attempting to open the [[door]] will cause the [[man]] inside to yell {{RSFont|Occupied!}}
</gallery>
